titleStmt.title: The funerall of symonie, impropriations, and tithes; or, A hurrycano [sic] or whirlwind among tithes, symonie, and impropriations Published by many welwillers to Christianity and learning, (and competent maintenance for the true labourers therein) and just right and equitie. Written by W. Leach of the Temple.
titleStmt.author: Leach, William.

notesStmt.note: "The funeral of symonie, impropriations, and tithes, &c." and "A safegard and a stay for sheriffs, and their officers, &c." have caption titles; register and pagination is separate.
Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.
